description: ff. 39. 220 x 162; 162 x 90 mm. 19 lin. Malatya, Ramaḍān 1143. Gloss on Anwār al-tanzīl, completed in Ramaḍān 1134. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... قوله الحمد لله الذى نزل الفرقان ... اقتباس من مواضع من القران بتغىىر ىسىر
author: Jarmakī, Abū Bakr ibn al-Ṭāhir, 18th cent
title: ḥāshiyah ʻalá tafsīr Sūrat al-Fātiḥah.
creator: Jarmakī, Abū Bakr ibn al-Ṭāhir, 18th cent
subject: Bayḍāwī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, d. 1286?—Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
